Human Resources Information Systems (HRIS) 路 Communication 路 Recruiting 路 Human Resources (HR)

Manabie is a fast-growing EdTech startup with a mission is to prepare us for tomorrows world by delivering education to everyone worldwide. Our vision is to create positive change for our learners, our society, and Mother Nature. 
Our product focuses solidly on education. We provide a B2B2C platform for Schools - Teachers - Students and Parents with everything they need to learn effectively: High-quality learning materials, a Great learning environment, a personal trainer, and more. Similar to the company culture, we - engineers - are lifelong learners. We will never stop learning to make tomorrow better than today.
